TaskRelation.name: TaskRelation
TaskRelation.description: Represents the relationship between a task and a lead, contacts, and other objects related to the task. If Shared Activities is enabled, this object doesnâ€™t support triggers, workflow, or data validation rules.

AccountId.description: Indicates the Account ID of the relation. For information on IDs, see ID Field Type.

IsWhat.description: Indicates whether the relation is an Account, Opportunity, Campaign, Case, other standard object, or a custom object. Value is false if RelationId is a contact or lead and true otherwise.

RelationId.description: Indicates the WhatId or WhoId in the relationship. For more information, see Task. For information on IDs, see ID Field Type.

TaskId.description: Represents the ID of the associated Task.For information on IDs, see ID Field Type.
